name: Leslie Santiago
text: My family and I came here and had great time. We ate at the buffet, which had a nice salad bar and of course pizza and played some games as well. There were a few games that weren't working, but I'm sure they are working on fixing them. It …More

name: Javier Zamora
text: amazing place for family and friends or a group.. we came in from Lewisville to enjoy this pizzas.. while remembering all  locations are close in the mayor DFW area..remember in 2000s lotacions everywhere..

name: Wendy Lackey
text: Our favorite pizza place! Just go! Bring the kids and enjoy yourself. The food is great.

name: Roger Grady
text: Great choices in food and drink.  Kids have a very good arcade games area to spend your dollars (although very reasonable compared to other places) and their time between munching on pizza.

name: Michelle Pierce
text: Mr. Gatti's recently made the switch to become a pizza buffet. they make whatever Pizza you request to order and put it on the buffet, they also have a salad buffet, as part of the salad buffet they include fruit options. They have soup, …More

name: joshua anderson
text: Nice place with very friendly staff. The food smells good too.

name: steven parsley
text: Its pretty good.  At least the kids enjoy it.  There are plenty of Pizzas made to really satisfy the pallet.  Place is always clean and staff is pretty friendly.  Sometimes they can be a bit aggressive in grabbing your empty plates from …More

name: Dorathy Turcotte
text: We had a pizza here for lunch and it was fabulous. We ordered the large meat special pizza and it was more than enough to eat. A small pizza would have been plenty for a couple for lunch. I tend to over order and then make sure I eat it all if good. I did leave one piece. The service was very good and the price was great.

name: Ninja R
text: Well. It's definitely pizza. It's not great pizza but it's pizza. I don't really have high expectations for buffet pizza. It was edible. That's... something, right? I imagine it's probably better when they expect higher traffic. I don't really plan on returning. Ugh, I hope not, anyway.

name: Lee Kuehner
text: Tried this place out last night. It's not the Go-to pizza place it was in the 80's and 90's. very disappointing. …More

name: Jay Sterling
text: Update now they have a pizza buffet and amazing salad buffet best pizza buffet in DFW!

name: Eric Wes
text: I found the pizza, the only thing we ate, to be quite good. Of course my 4-star rating is not going to help much, but I'm holding off on the 5th star until after a 2nd visit. …More

name: cameron handler
text: Good atmosphere for a family but if you are looking for great pizza keep driving.  The buffet has a good selection but when you go to a pizza buffet we all know why your there.  If they don't change the dough I would go.

name: Rebecca Hatton
text: This buffet is always great, but my favorite is the always fresh salad bar!! I wanted to take a pic of my pizza, but I ate them first...oops lol plus they have ice cream and an arcade!

name: ElleRDH
text: Do you like cardboard?? Old, cold pizza. No doubt, worse than your high school cafeteria. Same pizza out for 40+ minutes, we stayed longer to see if they would bring any fresh pies out—they did not. Keep driving!!

name: Rene Robles
text: This place is now a buffet, the pizza here taste good, the cinnamon sticks taste sweet and tangy, they have an ICEE machine as well. But my favorite part about this place is basically the game room, which is filled with redemption games to …More

name: Jennine Mangrum
text: We stopped here for lunch on the way back from our trip. We had a group of 10 (4 adults, 6 teenagers 13-16). We waited about 30 mins, which for a group that size is OK. The pizza was very good I thought and the teenagers loved it. The staff that we had was great and very friendly. Can definitely recommend this place.

name: Shadarkness
text: Love the place! It's a really awesome pizza place with great food, great prices and friendly employees. Definitely recommend if you're in the area!

name: John Maxwell
text: This Gatti's is now a buffet.  Pizza was still pretty much the same as it was prior to converting to a buffet. The salad bar is better than any of the other pizza restaurants in the area. …More

name: Molly Vulk
text: So much better! We came in about a year ago, and it was not a good experience. I saw they were offering a buffet now, so we gave it another chance. The food, the price, and the service were 100 times better!! Food was fresh (even after the …More

name: Sherri Thompson
text: The food is always great! The salad bar has a great variety. You can get an Icee for your drink! The reason for 4 instead of 5 stars is because the highchairs are always dirty. We have to take wipes to clean one before we can put the grandbaby in it. The tables and rest of the restaurant are always clean.

name: Nowras Baya
text: Amazing service, friendly/inviting staff, very clean. I come here frequently with friends & family. My daughter loves playing in their game room. 5 star all the way!

name: Jason walker
text: Very clean, and very polite. Was amazed. Plenty for kids in the game room. Manger on the floor. Constant fresh items on buffet. Couldn't ask for a better experience.

name: Greg
text: Just had our soccer kick-off party tonight.  Excellent food, fun game room and wide selection of cold beverages.      We will return for the end of season team party.

name: Anthony Powell
text: They went above and beyond to make a certain pizza for me. The entire crew was nice and respectful threw out the entire time dining. The salad bar is also really good.

name: Peter Shepherd
text: Love that they have veterans AND senior citizen discounts!! Heart Healthy: Salad + Gluten Free Cauliflower Crust, with Mushrooms, Olives,  & Chicken.

name: Barbara Ramsey
text: Very sweet cashier/server. Food preparation was great!

name: Jamie W
text: OMG i cant believe i was able to find a Mr Gattis. I went to one when i was a kid like twice a week.  This place was amazing and it brought back so many memories. Thank you for the great pizza.

name: John Frazier
text: Came in today to feed our 3 boys. There was literally 3 pizzas on the buffet. Sausage and pepperoni.  They told us, "we can make you whatever you want." Well, if I wanted to tell you what to make and I wanted to wait for it, I'd go to Pizza …More

name: Joshua Orourke
text: Very very delicious pizza some of best serve I have experience from a pizza buffet and the management they need a raise because those people are awesome

name: Bob Orwig
text: Went there for late lunch buffet. Pizza was good but not many varieties. It would be nice if they had signs telling you what kind of pizza it was. Will go back but earlier for lunch.

name: Erika Collins
text: This pizza is just not my cup of tea. To be honest it smells and tastes funky. Almost like they were trying to be too fancy with the sauce. The staff was super friendly and the place itself was beautiful and clean. I just did not care for the pizza.

name: Zach
text: Served us cold macaroni and cheese, and undercooked pizza dough.  When we complained, they had the audacity to offer us up 2 free meals written on the back of a business card for "when we chose to come back.". …More

name: Barbara Braddock
text: Great Italian food and brick oven pizza. Casual, relaxed atmosphere. Clean, great service. Tv's mounted above the seating area. Separate room, for parties or meetings.  Good prices.

name: Kris Keith
text: Love the buffet. Their pizza is the best and the games. While small, are a lot of fun for my kids. However, the pizza is greata Did I mention that?

name: Sterling H
text: A recent remodel shifted Mr. Gatti's more towards a buffet-style eatery, and I was afraid that it would basically be a Cici's now, however this is NOT the case. This place is still awesome! Their food is WAY better than Cici's. I recommend …More

name: George Brite
text: Really good pizza. Nice salad bar.

name: Carrie Levonius
text: What a great place to bring the young soccer team for their end of season celebration. Everyone got to order what they want including beer for the adults. It's not just pizza! Then the kids gat to go play in the game room and we could see …More

name: Tommy Valdez
text: Great service everyti.e we go for lunch. Dont change a thing.

name: Diane Settles
text: Pizza was decent, good salad bar. Kids loved the big arcade area.

name: July Franklin
text: The Best pizza in the world. The wonderful service is the icing on the cake...

name: Alister Remington
text: Fantastic service! Excellent staff! Just over a great place! And the pizza is amazing as well! Personally recommend the Lasagna!

name: Chloe Elizabeth
text: A great place to enjoy unlimited pizza and games with the family

name: PrinceofDeath
text: Pizza is ok, but the last 3 or 4 times we have been here around lunch time the buffet is practically empty. They are never ready for lunch, they aren't on top of getting fresh pizzas out to the line ready for lunch.

name: Joseph DeGarmo
text: Excellent food. Better than CiCi's on Precinct Line Rd in Hurst.

name: tim crawford
text: Best Buffet ever need more stores but my secret for now.

name: Jami Webb
text: My son and I had lunch here today. The meat on the pizzas was so dried out, curled burnt pepperoni and square mystery meat was tough. The sauce was nasty and pizza dough undercooked. The lettuce on the salad bar was soggy and awful!  I …More

name: An Cranford
text: This place is right around the corner from our house so we go all the time. Now, I am pretty picky about my pizza. From the sauce to the crust to the amount of cheese and the even dispersment of the toppings.

name: Tim Rice
text: Cold, old, chewy pizza. Bland very little real flavor. $5 bottled beer. Don’t waste your time.

name: Cynthia Alcorn
text: Ruined my childhood memory of excellent food. :(  Maybe they'll improve food quality.

name: Toretto Johnson
text: The buffet is very good with all you can eat.... salad bar....wine and beer you can drink. Great price and quality food.

name: Joel H
text: Pizza hit the spot! Sauce is good and kids loved it. Game room is fun, used to be free but now you have to pay for the games. Still a fun place to eat with the family.

name: Scott Jepson
text: Very friendly. Great pizza. They'll make any pizza you want.

name: Victor Camara
text: New spin on a great classic place. Pizza is pretty good too. Arcade games are decent and love the large Pacman! They should bring back classics they had, like 1492 game! Had fun there. Prizes could be better tho

name: Steven Lovelace
text:
Wood fire oven gives this pizza a great flavor > nothing like it.
The ingredients are top quality.
I'm very glad Mr Gatti's re-opened after many years. …More

name: Anthony Rainier
text: Average pizza. Average salad bar. Decent prices. Fun games but pricey.

name: David F
text: Great service, great quality/selection, great prices.

name: Russell Rogers
text:
*** FYI, No pizza buffet at this location. ***

I just wanted you to know that because I'm familiar with these restaurants …More

name: Chris Morein
text: Better pizza than CiCis. Pizza bar lacking at times. Friendly staff !

name: Rido Kilos
text: Love this place. Friendly staff and a great place to take a family

name: Cornel Cosman
text: Great place, good food and games for the kids! Me and my kids we really enjoy it!

name: Richard Escobar
text: Quiet, really good food very attentive staff kids loved the arcade

name: carole brumley
text: The casual atmosphere was pleasant. I liked the thin, crisp crust of the pizza, but other than that, it was just okay. The staff was nice

name: Andrew Neal
text: Great food and wonderful service top.  Staff is very friendly and restaurant is very well kept.  Very clean and well done interior.  Great game room reminiscent of ages past.

name: Tom Clark
text: Nice place with great food.

name: Sara Gaston
text: This was our first time eating at Mr. Gatti's and I must say I was surprised at the quality of the buffet and salad bar, especially for the price. I thought it would be a little more low budget, watery tasting, but it was actually good. Not …More

name: linda everitt coleman
text: Very clean restaurant. Friendly folks. Tasty selction of pizza. Loved the macaroni and cheese and green beans. Thankful to have mr gattis close enough to drive to.

name: Patrick Allen
text: Good price for a pizza buffet. They cook the pizzas in an actual pizza oven.

name: Heavy Early
text: It was disappointing. I remember gattis from when I was a teen and always loved it there.  I got there at one o'clock to find several families there but nothing but old pizza which was mostly cheese pizza. I ordered a buffet and drink but …More

name: Michelle Conley
text: Friendly service.  Food is blah....well...it is a buffet, enough said.

name: Joe Tab
text: 1st time at this restaurant, but we love Mr. Gattis! We drove all the way from S.  Arlington. Great place, clean and appears new! We're definitely coming back!

name: Susan Hunt
text:
Poor poor poor quality food - at nite, run by inexperienced young people
with no true manager on the job.  Only about twenty people and they
referred to having NO pizza to speak of on the bar for the two hours …More

name: Team Betts
text: Great Service and a wonderful atmosphere.

name: Trinity Lee
text: They took 20 minutes to make a small pizza with no cheese. At the time it wasn't even that busy, maybe 3 tables were occupied. It tasted good though.

name: G Mc
text: They changed to Buffet style. Honestly, if you been to Cici's pizza, there is really no difference. Also, alot of dirty dishes in the "clean" stack. Put dirty ones aside, only to watch them put them back with the clean ones. What!!? Dishes upright and put aside are for a reason. Will I be back? No way.

name: Sabrina Bagoje
text: I love to come to Mr. Gattis Pizza in North Richland. Always a wonderful experience with my family and that sauce is amazing!

name: Greg Henry
text: Great food and the game room was awesome.

name: William Sanders
text: Quality of the pizza was disappointing. Lacked flavor. The salad bar had wilted lettuce and celery was brown

name: I C
text: Average pizza that doesn't quite match its flashy logo and looks. It wasn't bad in the way that they were able to minimize "glue" (cheese dough interface goup), but I don't feel anything special about the pizza itself. Giving it a rating of average, with a little bit of disappointment.

name: Tim Byrns
text: Great pizza & free video games for kiddos. Very family friendly!

name: Stephen Schwartz
text: Great pizza. Free video games for kids. Service was good but a bit slow. Not true thin crust, but close.

name: JJ G
text: Impressed with space, but they couldn't keep up with buffet demands which takes away a star

name: Tom & Misty Swan
text: Poor food, worse service.  They forgot to bring out one pizza and when we went in to ask about it, they completely ignored us. We went in to ask again, and they admitted they were ignoring us, said yup and then turned around and walked off. …More

name: Bitsie Welch
text: Good food, friendly service, very clean and good price.

name: Dianne Thatcher
text: A great salad bar along with the pizza buffet.

name: Karon Jones
text: Awesome buffet! Many choices and good price!

name: Denise Farrell
text: The salad bar wasn't very fresh at all and the pizza wasn't up to par either.

name: Johnathan Bowman
text: Awesome food awesome prices

name: Asa Henderson
text: I've loved this place since I was a kid.  Very happy to see it expanding to my area.

name: Ty Wood
text: It's now a buffet, I wish it was still like when they first opened. I will definitely not be coming back again .

name: Michelle Kilburn
text: Salad great. Kids liked game area...small area,g good for very young kids, no older kid games. Pizza ok.

name: Blake Hutchison
text: Amazing wood fired pizza, I love the new game room as well

name: Jimpson Moore
text: I order a pizza they give me an hot pizza I don't know why? The manager looks very unpleasant person.

name: Garyn Rictor
text: Pizza was good and lots of fruit options on the salaf bar

name: Ashley Brown
text: it's not the same quality as mr. Gatti's used to be it's more like a Cici's

name: Lance Davis
text: Overpriced games and poor service. Told the staff we were going to play games with the kids and when we returned they had thrown away our dinner. They apologized but did nothing to remedy the situation.

name: Da Preacher
text: It was amazing, game room was amazing!

name: Melanee Southard
text: Wonderful place, very friendly service, super clean restaurant, and great tasting pizza and pasta Alfredo.

name: J Harsh
text:
Wow! That was truly the worst pizza I’ve ever had the misfortune to try eating.
Correction, it’s less pizzas and more of a pizza shaped item of some sort.
My kid eats microwave pizza luchables that are more pizza than that was. …More

name: Kevin Bast
text: Good service. Fair food. Chicken park was too breaded and the spagghetti was meh.

name: Paul Jackson
text: Made wrong pizza. Second pizza to correct was made like it was in a hurry

name: Ryan Foster
text: Best pizza in the world in my humble opinion. I don't care which one you go to or order from, your going to get amazing pizza every single time.

name: Jarrod Hamilton
text: Alec was very nice. He helped us order and gave us fun facts about the restaurant since it was our first time.

name: Debbie Daley
text: All the food was good, especially when they put out hot pizza. The music was too loud and annoying however.

name: T K
text: Terrible pizza got a pizza to go half margherita half pepporoni. Apparently the margherita pizza doesn't come with any pizza sauce white or red. Dry as heck and flavorless. The middle of it was still doughy and wasn't cooked all the way. …More

name: T W C
text:
Pizza - just ok...
Cal zone - Good, but why was it served with cold pizza sauce ???
Pep Rolls - Good, but again, cold pizza sauce dip ??? …More

name: Gigi Gupta
text: Nice new little arcade area. Good Pizza and Pasta . Beautiful ambience !

name: Ben Almond
text: Great new look for this place with a buffet and gameroom. Lost star because of not enough sauce on pizza.

name: Cole Gower
text: Great pizza, free arcade for the kids while you wait for your food. Definitely will be going back!

name: Nhien Nguyen
text: Good pizza, fun place. Enjoy it!

name: Trailer Commander
text: Typical chain fast food pizza.  Ok.

name: Sarah Hernalsteen
text: Our pizza and pepperoni bites showed up through Door Dash BURNT. This is the third time we’ve tried Mr. Gatti’s and they SUCK every time! So, I’m done. Hope they get SHUT DOWN.

name: Timothy Foster
text: The only thing that would make this better is if it were a buffet location.

name: Shanna hofmans
text: Horrible food.  Ordered through doordash for delivery and the chicken parmesan was completely burnt to the point it was black.  The garlic bread was burnt as well.  Don't waste your time or money here.

name: markjlin
text: Gluten free crust is the best I have had. Great food and service.

name: Laura Robles
text: I wish my son would have his birthday here at this Mr. Gatti's location in the future.

name: Steven Richer, Sr
text: The pizza is OK.  The appetizers are great.  My kid loves the game room.

name: John Ray
text: Grew up on Gattis pizza up north, always been my favorite, moved down to Texas an tried a couple of Gattis here, nothing compares to the NRH store, only pizza I eat now

name: Neal Cornett
text: Good pizza (gluten free options) with many choices on the menu (salads, sandwiches, pasta, wings and vegetarian options). I was surprised they had gelato!

name: Teri Dillinger
text: Ordered Margharita pizza and instead of Roma tomatoes and fresh basil like menu states they tried to serve me cherry tomatoes cut in half.  Cheap!  Cheap!

name: Chris Wallo
text: Great place for are arcade games and pizza 😀

name: Chase Morgan
text: Disappointing. We were the only ones in the restaurant and ordered one pizza and bread. Waited for 30 minutes and still didn't get our order. I had to go up to the front counter to remind them that we were still in the restaurant. Finally got the pizza after 45 minute wait and bread after 50 minutes.

name: Stephen Parker
text: Good pizza. Good pepperoni rolls. Free arcade for the kiddos.

name: Scott
text: Decent pizza, just doesn't stand out.

name: Breanna Braswell
text: Smells like sewer, bad food, and expinsive $15 for one plate if food and small drink silver were is disgusting. They dont wash they're dishes I would not recommend this place for nothing

name: Adam Kirchen
text: Good pizza, but I was bummed they did not have the Buffet. The pizza was fairly priced and they had our order it very quickly.

name: Richie Slocum
text: Ditto on the poor food service and cleanliness! This is a weekend, but it not their first weekend, please get it together!

name: Alix Brame
text: I would highly recommend this restaurant.

name: William Roles
text: Ordered 2 pizzas last night at 7:30.... Checked on them at 8:10...( " Will be ready in a few minutes") ... Checked again at 8:30.... .. " Sorry we must have put yours out for the buffet"

name: ACMS O
text: Very clean,  quiet,  and good food!

name: Coronavirus BS
text: Great service Great food!!

name: Paul Barfield
text: Love the Pizza ,, Better thin CiCi's

name: K Sanchez
text: Very friendly service,  super clean restaurant,  and great tasting pizza. My husband and I stopped in and ate a pizza and 2 drinks for less than $15.

text: Service is bad. Food not served together. My friend had food. Mine came after he was finished eating

name: david kinnison
text: Love the flat bread pizza.

name: Jennifer White
text: Not as good as it was back in the day

name: laurene jenness

name: GamerOfLapiz
text: Its good

name: Chris Weis
